name.en,en_AU: IGPost - Export Instagram photos and videos

short.ar,gu: Maximize your Instagram experience by easily downloading and exporting content for personal use.

short.cs,ml,no,ru: Your go-to Instagram content downloader, making it easy to save posts, videos, and profiles.
short.da,sk,sw: Effortlessly export Instagram photos and videos, with advanced options for format and quality.
short.de,hu,zh_CN: A comprehensive tool to extract and download Instagram content, including stories, posts, and videos.
short.el,en_US,fi,pt_BR,zh_TW: An all-in-one Instagram content downloader, designed for easy exporting and archiving.

short.en_GB,et,fil,hr: A streamlined solution for downloading Instagram content, with enhanced features for exporting.
short.es_419,th: The ultimate tool for downloading and exporting Instagram photos and videos, with a focus on simplicity.

short.ja,lv,te,tr: A user-friendly plugin to quickly download and export Instagram posts, stories, and media to your local storage.
short.ko,pl: Download and archive Instagram profiles, posts, and videos seamlessly with this intuitive tool.
short.lt: Collect, download, and export Instagram media in bulk with this powerful extension.
short.nl,sl,sr: An efficient way to backup and export Instagram content, maintaining quality and metadata.
short.sv: A powerful extension for saving Instagram posts and videos, with intuitive interface and quick export options.
short.ta: Seamlessly download and save Instagram photos, videos, and stories to your device for offline access.
short.uk: A robust tool for archiving and exporting Instagram content, designed for efficiency and speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A helper tool, one-click to download Post, pictures, Photos and Videos from Instagram user.

# Features
✓ Export photos and videos from post
✓ Batch download photos per post

# How to get started?
1. Enter Instagram Username
2. Click Export Button

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.
